import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch' const ListDataTable = (props) => { return (
{props.data.title}
{props.data.category_name}
{props.data.author}
 {props.data.created_at} {props.data.update_at}
{props.data.status_post}
) } Index.getInitialProps = async () => { const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3004/jsonusers') const data = await response.json() return { data } } export default ListDataTable;
